titleStmt.title: Resolves of the Committee of Safety. Whereunto is added the Saints dictionary: or, A catalogue of some pretious books chiefly intended for the use of those that are well-affected to this good new cause.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

titleStmt.title: Resolves of the Committee of Safety. Whereunto is added the Saints dictionary: or, A catalogue of some pretious books chiefly intended for the use of those that are well-affected to this good new cause.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Committee of Safety.

notesStmt.note: Not in fact by the Committee of Safety, but a satire on what the author perceives as religious irregularity, with particular attention to the Society of Friends.
Signatures: A ² A (-A1 and A2) B⁴.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
